unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Analyzing $T$-Table Results
question_text: Suppose a one-sided test gives a test statistic $t = 2.45$ for a sample of size $n=24$ . What conclusion can be made at the $\alpha = 5\%$ level?

choices.text: Reject H 0 H 0 at the 5 % 5 % level.
Fail to reject H 0 H 0 at the 5 % 5 % level.
Reject H a H a at the 5 % 5 % level.
Fail to reject H a H a at the 5 % 5 % level.
Retain the null at the 5 % 5 % level.
